title: Banished (Latest With 1.0.4 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest version of Banished. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


------------------------


Changelog for version 1.0.4: 


This version fixes some gameplay issues and adds modding support. 

---------------------------


Changes: 1.0.3


-Fixed a potential crash that could occur if two buildings overlapped. 
-Fixed splitting or emptying herds from pastures. This will no longer 
cause small pastures to become overfull. 
-Added an option to set the scale of status icons. This is useful in 
ultra wide resolutions where the icons become large. 
-Fixed a bug that caused large population cities to randomly unassign 
workers. 
-Fixed a pause/lag that would occur as the game reassigned workers to 
new professions. 
-Fixed a bug that allowed the edges of tunnels to overlap other buildings. 
-Fixed an infinite loop that occured using the path tool when a citizen 
couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get from home to a workplace. 
-Citizens without a workplace will once again do any job on the map. 
Citizens that have jobs will generally still stay near their workplace 
unless work to be done has been around for several months and no general 
laborer has done it
